title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-2.12 - Garbage; refuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-2.12 - Garbage; refuse

State Regulations

Adequate and sanitary facilities shall be provided for the storage and disposal of garbage and refuse. Sanitary methods shall be used for the collection, temporary storage, handling and disposal of garbage and refuse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
